casebody.data:
Lawrence PHIFER, Plaintiff,
v.
PASQUOTANK COUNTY; the City of Elizabeth City; Elizabeth City Chief of Police, Eddie Buffaloe, Jr., in his official and individual capacities; City Manager, Rich Olson, in his official and individual capacities, Defendants. No. COA17-1155 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 7, 2018

REVERSED. REMANDED.
